title: Himi 514
lyrics:
6.6.6.6.8.8.
“Ko e ng langi ‘oku nau tala ‘a e
nāunau’ia ‘o ‘Ela ... Ko e lao ‘a
Sihova ‘oku haohaoa, ‘oku fakafoki
ai ‘a e laumālie.” (Saame 19)
1.
Mou hanga hake ā
He femāmēnite,
Ko e ngāue pe ‘a ‘Ela
Fetu’u na fulipē:
Ko e ‘Eiki Ia ‘o Natula
Ko hotau tupu’i ‘Otua.
2.
‘Oku nau fakahā
‘A e ivi hono nima;
‘O tala he ‘ata
‘A hono naunau’ia:
Po mo e ‘aho ‘oku lea
He poto mo e ngū ‘o ‘Ela.
3.
Ka ko e folofola
Kuo ne fakae’a,
‘Ikai ke haohaoa
Huafa ia ko ‘Ela:
Felave ai me’a fulipē
Kae hala hotau laumālie.
4.
Mou hanga hake ā,
‘O lau he folofola;
‘Oku ne fakae’a
Huafa ko Sihova:
Huafa ka fungani ē
He lave ai ‘a e laumālie.
5.
Me’a fakafiefia
Kuo tō mai ‘a e ‘Otua
Ko ‘Ela ai pē Ia
He ‘Eiki ‘o Natula:
Ka ko ‘IMĀNUELA foki,
SĪSŪ ko hotau kāinga ofi. *
